english.segment1: Contemplate what holds you at this time?. Books, self help, pills for your spells. Never quiet for fear no one listens. Somewhere you'll be someone
english.segment2: Become everything you fear. Frivolity and its necessities. Become everything you fear. Frivolity
english.segment3: Two and six, tricked to feeling younger. Never valiant when it's time. He's someone you used to remember. Still immersed in mirrors
